# Distract Assailant (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, S, M (the dried wing of a fly)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 69

*Buzzing under your breath like a fly, you swat at the sky and toss the flyâ€™s wing in your hand into the air. The target of your spell becomes distracted, starting at shadows and looking about for unseen assailants.*

A creature affected by this spell is [[Flat-Footed|flat-footed]] until the beginning of its next turn.
